name: @neurosongs/types
description: Shared type variables for Neurosongs models
author: alextheman

scripts.format: npm run format-prettier && npm run format-eslint
scripts.format-prettier: npm run format-prettier-typescript && npm run format-prettier-javascript
scripts.lint: npm run lint-tsc && npm run lint-eslint && npm run lint-prettier
scripts.lint-prettier: npm run lint-prettier-typescript && npm run lint-prettier-javascript
